author: Simon Difford
description: A fruity, vanilla-ed twist on the classic Mojito.
name: Pineapple Mojito
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
22.5 ml Licor 43 (or other spiced vanilla liqueur)

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in glass
POUR other ingredients into glass and half fill with crushed ice
Fill glass with more crushed ice, churn and serve with straws
